summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1798, for the improvement of Pinellas Place, from North Fifty-fifth Street to Kenwood Place; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, together with the necessary appurtenances for proper drainage, under Ordinance No. 18697, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
